General.Name: Bk Harda Internasional Tbk Pt
General.Description: PT Allo Bank Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers savings and current accounts; time deposits; and working capital, investment, and consumer loans. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Harda Internasional Tbk and changed its name to PT Allo Bank Indonesia Tbk in June 2021. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Allo Bank Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Mega Corpora.
General.Address: ASEAN Tower Lantai 2-3, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10710
